thread.title: Zuzana

author: Zuzana
title: Zuzana
text: I used "Trusted Housesitters" only twice since I registered with them but I have to say I am very pleased I joined as I was very worried to leave my house and beloved dog with complete strangers...however the web is easy to use, easy to make your profile and check the sitters profiles. There is lots of experienced and reliable sitters with great referencies, you are garanteed to find a sitter. I am very happy that my dog don't have to go to kennels and also it's lots cheaper to register and go away and use "Trusted housitters" as many times as you like! ( yearly membership fee-which is less then week in kennels) so it is win-win situation for everyone ;0)
